LUVOIR_inputs_gen¶

aplc_optimization.Inputs_Generation.LUVOIR_Inputs_Generation.LUVOIR_inputs_gen(input_files_dict)[source]¶

Generate LUVOIR-A aperture and Lyot stop(s) input mask files for the APLC coronagraph.

input_files_dict: dict

A dictionary of input mask parameters.

pup_filename: str

The name of the generated telescope aperture FITS file.

ls_filename: list

The name(s) of the generated Lyot stop FITS file(s).
